Does Ghotme really adapt to my niche?: Does Ghotme really adapt to my niche?
Absolutely! When registering, you choose: Absolutely! When registering, you choose your segment (Workshop, Pet Shop, Assistance, etc.) and the system automatically changes all terms, icons and processes to speak your language. It is a system tailored for you.
We accept credit cards, bank slips and t: We accept credit cards, bank slips and the innovative Dynamic PIX with automatic clearing. Additionally, Ghotme is already prepared for the future and allows receiving through Bitcoin.
Will my accountant have access to the sy: Will my accountant have access to the system?
Yes! We created an exclusive Accountant: Yes! We created an exclusive Accountant Portal. They will be able to download your XMLs, check your revenue and perform financial auditing (BPO) without you having to send stacks of papers every month.
Just import your bank's OFX file and Gho: Just import your bank's OFX file and Ghotme automatically matches it with your sales and expenses. You save hours of manual work and avoid typing errors in your financials.
Will I have support to configure the sys: Will I have support to configure the system?
Yes! We offer humanized support via What: Yes! We offer humanized support via WhatsApp and internal chat. Our team helps you with data import and initial configuration so you can start billing as soon as possible.
